entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
